name: Bulk indexing of monitoring data on closed indices should throw an export exception

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-d5629731b10128a0a578e1b7fe0c6c2fb0a1c951 "[xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled] setting was deprecated in Elasticsearch and will be removed in a future release. See the deprecation documentation for the next major version."
